attributes.title: The Qualities of Enlightened Beings | Bhagavad Gita Sanyasa Yoga (Chapter 5, Verse 20)
attributes.description:
In this video (29 July 2012), Paramahamsa Nithyananda expands on the Karma Sanyasa Yoga chapter of the Bhagavad Gita where Bhagawan Sri Krishna describes one of the qualities of enlightened beings - Don’t rejoice by obtaining something with which you agree; Don’t shrink by getting something you don’t desire. 

Paramahamsa Nithyananda also underlines the importance of remembering the inspiring qualities of enlightened beings, otherwise a spiritual aspirant will reconfirm his distance from enlightenment and actually increase the distance.
